üñ•Ô∏è &nbsp;Databases&nbsp; üñ•Ô∏è.name: SQL
üñ•Ô∏è &nbsp;Databases&nbsp; üñ•Ô∏è.desc: Relational databases are using SQL (89 or 92) as their query language. Since ~2011, NoSQL databases are more and more used.

üñ•Ô∏è &nbsp;Databases&nbsp; üñ•Ô∏è.desc: Learn about NoSQL 'NotOnlySQL', 4 new kinds of databases which are more flexible than relational databases (such as MongoDB or Cypher).
